option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.POST_NOTIFICATIONS" />
<application android:name=".WorkoutApplication" android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher" android:label="@string/app_name" android:resizeableActivity="false" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.Workout" tools:targetApi="31"> <activity android:name=".MainActivity" android:exported="true" android:screenOrientation="portrait"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
<category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity>
<receiver android:name=".notifications.WaterReminderReceiver" android:exported="true" android:permission="android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="com.fitness.workout.ACTION_WATER_REMINDER" /> <action android:name="android.intent.action.BOOT_COMPLETED" /> </intent-filter> </receiver>
</application>
</manifest>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.POST_NOTIFICATIONS" />
<application android:name=".WorkoutApplication" android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher" android:label="@string/app_name" android:resizeableActivity="false" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.Workout" tools:targetApi="31"> <activity android:name=".MainActivity" android:exported="true" android:screenOrientation="portrait"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
<category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity>
<receiver android:name=".notifications.WaterReminderReceiver" android:exported="true" android:permission="android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="com.fitness.workout.ACTION_WATER_REMINDER" /> <action android:name="android.intent.action.BOOT_COMPLETED" /> </intent-filter> </receiver>
</application>
</manifest>

option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/bg_theme_gradient" tools:context="com.fitness.workout.ui.workouts.WorkoutDetailFragment">
<!-- Hero image with back button --> <androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView android:id="@+id/heroImage" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="220dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/ic_launcher_foreground" android:contentDescription="@string/header_image_cd" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView android:id="@+id/scroll" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/heroImage" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:paddingTop="12dp" android:paddingBottom="24dp">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:id="@+id/title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/workout_title" android:textSize="22sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingTop="8dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView android:id="@+id/icTimerSmall" android:layout_width="16dp" android:layout_height="16dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_timer" android:tint="@color/text_secondary" android:contentDescription="@string/fire_cd" />
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:id="@+id/timer" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/timer_default" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:layout_marginStart="6dp" />
<View android:layout_width="12dp" android:layout_height="1dp" />
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:id="@+id/tvLevel" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/level_beginner" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" />
<View android:layout_width="12dp" android:layout_height="1dp" />
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView android:id="@+id/icTag" android:layout_width="14dp" android:layout_height="14dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_workout" android:tint="@color/text_secondary" android:contentDescription="@string/workout_thumbnail_cd" />
</LinearLayout>
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:id="@+id/description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:text="@string/describe_text" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="12dp">
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="1dp" android:layout_marginBottom="5dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="8dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView android:id="@+id/icFire" android:layout_width="18dp" android:layout_height="18dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_fire" android:tint="@color/accent_orange" android:contentDescription="@string/fire_cd" />
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:id="@+id/tvCalories" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:text="@string/calorie_burn" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="5dp" app:cardElevation="1dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="8dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView android:layout_width="18dp" android:layout_height="18dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_launcher_foreground" android:tint="#E91E63" />
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:text="@string/yoga_mat" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Instructor row --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="1dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="12dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView android:layout_width="44dp" android:layout_height="44dp" android:src="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:contentDescription="@string/profile_avatar" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingStart="12dp" android:paddingEnd="12dp">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:id="@+id/tvInstructorName" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/instructor_label" android:textStyle="bold" />
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:id="@+id/tvInstructorBio" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/instructor_bio" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Exercises header --> <androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:id="@+id/tvExercisesCount" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/exercises_count" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" />
<!-- RecyclerView for exercises --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvExercises" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:nestedScrollingEnabled="false" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView>
<!-- Start button and timer (anchored to bottom) --> <androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageButton android:id="@+id/btnOpenPlayer" android:layout_width="64dp" android:layout_height="64dp" android:layout_margin="16dp" android:background="@drawable/circle_bg" android:src="@drawable/ic_play" android:tint="@color/white" android:contentDescription="@string/play_cd" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:id="@+id/startButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/let_s_start" android:visibility="gone" android:gravity="center" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:paddingVertical="15dp" android:textColor="@color/white" android:background="@drawable/btn_rounded_primary" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" android:layout_margin="16dp" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/bg_theme_gradient" tools:context="com.fitness.workout.ui.workouts.WorkoutDetailFragment">
<!-- Hero image with back button --> <androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView android:id="@+id/heroImage" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="220dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/ic_launcher_foreground" android:contentDescription="@string/header_image_cd" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView android:id="@+id/scroll" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/heroImage" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:paddingTop="12dp" android:paddingBottom="24dp">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:id="@+id/title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/workout_title" android:textSize="22sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingTop="8dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView android:id="@+id/icTimerSmall" android:layout_width="16dp" android:layout_height="16dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_timer" android:tint="@color/text_secondary" android:contentDescription="@string/fire_cd" />
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:id="@+id/timer" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/timer_default" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:layout_marginStart="6dp" />
<View android:layout_width="12dp" android:layout_height="1dp" />
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:id="@+id/tvLevel" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/level_beginner" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" />
<View android:layout_width="12dp" android:layout_height="1dp" />
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView android:id="@+id/icTag" android:layout_width="14dp" android:layout_height="14dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_workout" android:tint="@color/text_secondary" android:contentDescription="@string/workout_thumbnail_cd" />
</LinearLayout>
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:id="@+id/description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:text="@string/describe_text" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="12dp">
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="1dp" android:layout_marginBottom="5dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="8dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView android:id="@+id/icFire" android:layout_width="18dp" android:layout_height="18dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_fire" android:tint="@color/accent_orange" android:contentDescription="@string/fire_cd" />
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:id="@+id/tvCalories" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:text="@string/calorie_burn" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="5dp" app:cardElevation="1dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="8dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView android:layout_width="18dp" android:layout_height="18dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_launcher_foreground" android:tint="#E91E63" />
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:text="@string/yoga_mat" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Instructor row --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="1dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="12dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView android:layout_width="44dp" android:layout_height="44dp" android:src="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:contentDescription="@string/profile_avatar" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingStart="12dp" android:paddingEnd="12dp">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:id="@+id/tvInstructorName" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/instructor_label" android:textStyle="bold" />
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:id="@+id/tvInstructorBio" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/instructor_bio" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Exercises header --> <androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:id="@+id/tvExercisesCount" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/exercises_count" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" />
<!-- RecyclerView for exercises --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvExercises" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:nestedScrollingEnabled="false" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView>
<!-- Start button and timer (anchored to bottom) --> <androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageButton android:id="@+id/btnOpenPlayer" android:layout_width="64dp" android:layout_height="64dp" android:layout_margin="16dp" android:background="@drawable/circle_bg" android:src="@drawable/ic_play" android:tint="@color/white" android:contentDescription="@string/play_cd" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextView android:id="@+id/startButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/let_s_start" android:visibility="gone" android:gravity="center" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:paddingVertical="15dp" android:textColor="@color/white" android:background="@drawable/btn_rounded_primary" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" android:layout_margin="16dp" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <navigation xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:id="@+id/nav_graph" app:startDestination="@id/homeFragment">
<fragment android:id="@+id/homeFragment" android:name="com.fitness.workout.ui.home.HomeFragment" android:label="Home"> <action android:id="@+id/action_homeFragment_to_categoryFragment" app:destination="@id/categoryFragment" /> <action android:id="@+id/action_homeFragment_to_workoutDetailFragment" app:destination="@id/workoutDetailFragment" app:enterAnim="@anim/nav_default_enter_anim" app:exitAnim="@anim/nav_default_exit_anim" /> <action android:id="@+id/action_homeFragment_to_programFragment" app:destination="@id/programFragment" /> </fragment>
<fragment android:id="@+id/categoryFragment" android:name="com.fitness.workout.ui.home.CategoryFragment" android:label="Category"> <argument android:name="categoryName" app:argType="string" /> <action android:id="@+id/action_categoryFragment_to_workoutDetailFragment" app:destination="@id/workoutDetailFragment" /> </fragment>
<fragment android:id="@+id/workoutDetailFragment" android:name="com.fitness.workout.ui.workouts.WorkoutDetailFragment" android:label="Workout Detail"> <argument android:name="workoutId" app:argType="integer" /> <!-- action to exercise detail --> <action android:id="@+id/action_workoutDetailFragment_to_exerciseDetailFragment" app:destination="@id/exerciseDetailFragment" /> <!-- action to open player screen --> <action android:id="@+id/action_workoutDetailFragment_to_workoutPlayerFragment" app:destination="@id/workoutPlayerFragment" /> </fragment>
<fragment android:id="@+id/workoutPlayerFragment" android:name="com.fitness.workout.ui.workouts.WorkoutPlayerFragment" android:label="Workout Player"> <argument android:name="workoutId" app:argType="integer" /> <action android:id="@+id/action_workoutPlayerFragment_to_exerciseDetailFragment" app:destination="@id/exerciseDetailFragment" /> </fragment>
<fragment android:id="@+id/exerciseDetailFragment" android:name="com.fitness.workout.ui.workouts.ExerciseDetailFragment" android:label="Exercise Detail"> <argument android:name="exercise" app:argType="com.fitness.workout.data.model.Exercise" /> </fragment>
<fragment android:id="@+id/programFragment" android:name="com.fitness.workout.ui.program.ProgramFragment" android:label="Program" />
<fragment android:id="@+id/progressFragment" android:name="com.fitness.workout.ui.progress.ProgressFragment" android:label="Progress" />
<fragment android:id="@+id/moreFragment" android:name="com.fitness.workout.ui.more.MoreFragment" android:label="More"> <action android:id="@+id/action_moreFragment_to_profileDetailsFragment" app:destination="@id/profileDetailsFragment" /> </fragment>
<fragment android:id="@+id/profileDetailsFragment" android:name="com.fitness.workout.ui.profile.ProfileDetailsFragment" android:label="Profile Details" /> </navigation>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <navigation xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:id="@+id/nav_graph" app:startDestination="@id/homeFragment">
<fragment android:id="@+id/homeFragment" android:name="com.fitness.workout.ui.home.HomeFragment" android:label="Home"> <action android:id="@+id/action_homeFragment_to_categoryFragment" app:destination="@id/categoryFragment" /> <action android:id="@+id/action_homeFragment_to_workoutDetailFragment" app:destination="@id/workoutDetailFragment" app:enterAnim="@anim/nav_default_enter_anim" app:exitAnim="@anim/nav_default_exit_anim" /> <action android:id="@+id/action_homeFragment_to_programFragment" app:destination="@id/programFragment" /> </fragment>
<fragment android:id="@+id/categoryFragment" android:name="com.fitness.workout.ui.home.CategoryFragment" android:label="Category"> <argument android:name="categoryName" app:argType="string" /> <action android:id="@+id/action_categoryFragment_to_workoutDetailFragment" app:destination="@id/workoutDetailFragment" /> </fragment>
<fragment android:id="@+id/workoutDetailFragment" android:name="com.fitness.workout.ui.workouts.WorkoutDetailFragment" android:label="Workout Detail"> <argument android:name="workoutId" app:argType="integer" /> <!-- action to exercise detail --> <action android:id="@+id/action_workoutDetailFragment_to_exerciseDetailFragment" app:destination="@id/exerciseDetailFragment" /> <!-- action to open player screen --> <action android:id="@+id/action_workoutDetailFragment_to_workoutPlayerFragment" app:destination="@id/workoutPlayerFragment" /> </fragment>
<fragment android:id="@+id/workoutPlayerFragment" android:name="com.fitness.workout.ui.workouts.WorkoutPlayerFragment" android:label="Workout Player"> <argument android:name="workoutId" app:argType="integer" /> <action android:id="@+id/action_workoutPlayerFragment_to_exerciseDetailFragment" app:destination="@id/exerciseDetailFragment" /> </fragment>
<fragment android:id="@+id/exerciseDetailFragment" android:name="com.fitness.workout.ui.workouts.ExerciseDetailFragment" android:label="Exercise Detail"> <argument android:name="exercise" app:argType="com.fitness.workout.data.model.Exercise" /> </fragment>
<fragment android:id="@+id/programFragment" android:name="com.fitness.workout.ui.program.ProgramFragment" android:label="Program" />
<fragment android:id="@+id/progressFragment" android:name="com.fitness.workout.ui.progress.ProgressFragment" android:label="Progress" />
<fragment android:id="@+id/moreFragment" android:name="com.fitness.workout.ui.more.MoreFragment" android:label="More"> <action android:id="@+id/action_moreFragment_to_profileDetailsFragment" app:destination="@id/profileDetailsFragment" /> </fragment>
<fragment android:id="@+id/profileDetailsFragment" android:name="com.fitness.workout.ui.profile.ProfileDetailsFragment" android:label="Profile Details" /> </navigation>

option.name: updatedContent
